title.jp: I'm Going to Marry Her, Once I Leave This School

synopsis: On her way to school, Nanami Knight Braidfield encounters a boy who saves people from a collision.  After observing him in class where he behaves rudely, she confronts him and finds he has the ability to see somebody’s future in the form of flags.

title.jp: Girls Are in the Dorm. But I Can't Say it Yet. Wait Until Tomorrow.

synopsis: Souta Hatate meets his old friend Okiku.  They have renovated the Quest Dorm thanks to Mimori Seiteikouji’s volunteers.  Souta, Megu, Akane, Okiku, and Nanami move in to keep the dorm open.  Souta recalls how he got his powers.

title.jp: Leave it to Me, There is a 99.9% Chance We're Going to Win This Athletic Meet

synopsis: Everyone is settling in at Quest Dorm when Akane gets a female android named Ninjabayashi Ruri from her family.  Meanwhile, Hatagaya Academy’s student council president announces the start of a week-long track meet, and then Mimori surprises everyone.

title.jp: The Goal is Close. The Sports Festival Will Thus be Over Too.

synopsis: The week-long track meet starts.  A new member joins, and everyone tries to prevent the Quest Dorm from shutting down and Souta being expelled.  Mimori has a large list of events, and everyone works hard to get MVP, but something puts them all at risk.

title.jp: Please Believe Me While Waiting. I Won't be Late on a Date With Everyone.

synopsis: Souta promises to go on a date with Akane, and the rest of Quest Dorm finds out about it, and wants to go as well. Nanami stays back at home, but Souta has to go on a date with Megumu, Akane, Rin, and Kikuno.

title.jp: Phew... You Scared Me There. Good Thing It's Only My Little Sister.

synopsis: Daimyouzamurai Mei, a transfer student, joins class 1-F. She seems to also have the ability to see and manipulate flags. Meanwhile, class 1-F is split into two groups and goes on a trip to the ocean and forest. Souta is forced to join both trips.

title.jp: I've Learned Something I Wasn't Meant to Know. I Need to Hide Myself Before I Disappear Without a Trace

synopsis: Hatagaya Academy goes on a trip near the ocean, and Souta meets Daishikyougawa Kurumiko there. Souta enlists the help Mimori Seiteikouji, the granddaughter of the chair. Souta and Mimori go on a date as compensation.

title.jp: I'll Catch Up With You Later. Have I Ever Broken a Promise Before?

synopsis: Souta returns home with Kikuno during summer break, and is spoiled by her. Ruri shows up all of a sudden and takes him away. He ends up at Akane's house. Everyone from Quest Dorm is worried about him and shows up, except for Nanami.

title.jp: I Hope, One Day, We Can All Go to a Festival Together Again.

synopsis: The Quest Dorm goes to Nanami's home country, the Principality of Bladefield, and meets Nanami's little sister Hakua, and the crown prince. There's big news about Hakua and Nanami. Then No. 0 talks to Hatate about the founding fairy tail of the country.

title.jp: Hold on to This for Me. the Beauty Pageant Winner's Name Is Inside It

synopsis: Souta recommends the Quest Dorm enters the Miss Hatagaya Academy Beauty Contest.  Nanami gives a speech to cheer up Souta, and wins a festival pass which makes everything free as long as she is with Souta.  They meet a girl who is running from something.

title.jp: No Need for All of You to Dance. I Can Handle It All by Myself

synopsis: The mysterious girl is idol Serika Ginyuuin.  During her concert Souta’s powers increase and time freezes.  No. 0 tells Souta he must leave or the world will be destroyed.  Souta erases Quest Dorm’s memories of him, but Nanami is unaffected and remembers.

title.jp: It's a Cruel World.  I'm Going to Take a Look in the Shadows.

synopsis: Souta fights the Angelus Gemini to protect his  world by placing “Death Flag” on his enemies.  Nanami learns from Riru how she is linked to Souta, and takes the Quest Dorm members to help Souta fight.

Souta regains his memory and learns he knew the girls once before, but had Laplace’s Demon save them.  Souta and the girls fight the Premium Ambriel, but his death flag breaks and he awakes in the real world where he learns more about his past.
